text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump There are almost 3 million people in Kansas. Only 14,000 have been tested, and those are people with symptoms or risks. 

And you expect us to open our businesses up in a couple of weeks? 

#DreamOn

https://t.co/vgUC6VUv8q
